title: Mártires (Quarenta)
body: Regarding the passage of the forty religious of the Society of Jesus through Madeira, who on July 15, 1570, were massacred in the heights of the Canary Islands archipelago, see the article Azevedo (Beato Inácio de) on page 110 of vol. I and the book *Paróquia de Santo António na Ilha da Madeira*.

Canárias: Heights of the Canary Islands archipelago

1570: Massacre of the forty religious of the Society of Jesus
